sentences.en: a lack of spiritual values in the modern world
sentences.cn: 现代世界精神价值的缺失

sentences.en: A shortage of building land will push property values up.
sentences.cn: 建筑用地缺乏将造成房地产价格逐渐上升.

sentences.en: Bennett launched a crusade for "moral values" against decadent "liberal relativism."
sentences.cn: 贝内特发起了一场捍卫“道德价值”、反对腐朽堕落的“自由相对论”的战争。

sentences.en: Emphasis was placed on the school as a transmitter of moral values.
sentences.cn: 人们强调学校为道德价值观的传输者。

sentences.en: Family values are suddenly the name of the game.
sentences.cn: 家庭价值观突然变得重要起来。

sentences.en: I realize there's no consensus on what are male or female values.
sentences.cn: 我意识到人们对什么是男性价值观和什么是女性价值观并无共识。

sentences.en: Moral values cannot be taught in a vacuum.
sentences.cn: 道德价值观的教育不能脱离实际。

sentences.en: Most media coverage disapproves of the travellers' lifestyle and values.
sentences.cn: 大多数媒体报道都不赞成那些旅行者的生活方式和价值观。

sentences.en: She has some old-fashioned values and can be a strict disciplinarian.
sentences.cn: 她的观念比较保守，有时过于严格地奉行纪律。

sentences.en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
The countries of South Asia also share many common values.
sentences.cn: 南亚各国也有许多相同的价值观。

sentences.en: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
sentences.cn: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

sentences.en: The range of tog values has been extended to 15 togs.
sentences.cn: 托格值的范围已经扩大至15托格。

sentences.en: The value of his investment has risen by more than $50,000.
sentences.cn: 他的投资价值已经增长$50000多。

sentences.en: Their marriage is a delicate balance between traditional and contemporary values.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻在传统和现代价值观之间保持着微妙平衡。
维多利亚时代的价值观受到了严重误解。

trans.tran_cn: 对价值的看法，准则，价值观念，值( value的名词复数 )，价值，价值标准，（货币、邮票等的）面值，价值观
trans.tran_en: The value of something is how much money it is worth

trans.tran_cn: 估价( value的第三人称单数 )，重视，给…定价，评价
